meanings.definition: The most extreme or utmost effort or ability.
meanings.sent1: She put her damndests into finishing the race.
meanings.sent2: He gave it his damndests to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent3: With her damndests, she managed to solve the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent4: His damndests in the kitchen turned ordinary ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent5: The team's damndests in practice paid off during the championship game.

meanings.definition: The most extreme or utmost degree.
meanings.sent1: The damndests of her excitement was evident in her wide smile.
meanings.sent2: He reached the damndests of his patience before finally losing his temper.
meanings.sent3: The damndests of the storm caused trees to fall all over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The damndests of her fear made her heart race uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The damndests of his dedication was unmatched by anyone else in the team.
